title: Storm Hits The Ranch and Left Us With a Surprise!

tasks.task: Visit a ranch and check on farm animals and equipment
subtasks: Drive to ranch after a wedding in Oklahoma City
Check a turkey pen for a turkey that may have escaped
Look for signs of water damage or flooding in the area
Search for arrowheads or artifacts after storms
Ensure that livestock are accounted for and in the proper pens
Greet and manage farm animals like turkeys, bison, and dogs
Manage gates and ensure proper pen security
Handle farm equipment or pathways for entering or exiting the property
Address potential issues with falling tree limbs or debris
Discuss farm operations and plans for the future, such as breeding and selling bulls
Consider the care and handling of turkey eggs, including potential incubation

tasks.task: Promote a farming supplement brand (AG1) during the video
subtasks: Explain the benefits of the product to viewers
Provide instructions for using the product as a morning supplement
Encourage viewers to subscribe or purchase the product at a discounted rate
